A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Just saw it. It was awful! I felt confused while watching it because of so many plotholes! The stupid Finn and Rose romance plot\, I would've taken that off! Less character development\, super woman Leia\, anyone could die out in space and be killed within seconds IRL! 

The lightsaber battle with Rey and Kylo vs those red costume ppl scene was pretty cool\, but not enough to entertain me. The comedy was lame\, didn't laughed once\, but a few audience did.

And the way Rian wrote Luke Skywalker! It was terrible! I couldn't see him drinking those breast milk from creatures! It was disgusting! Who on earth would fucking do that IRL!?! The (sorta) battle scene between him and Kylo (Ben) was sorta cool. I like how Mark had enough energy in him to pull off those massive dodging moves! I'm surprised he's able to do that at his current age! But his death was just stupidly written!

And the Rey's parents part? Why was that added? Ugh!

And we hardly know anything about the Snoke character! Such stupid writing! It's like everything was rushed too fast on this movie so they just put it in and didn't even bother of character development\, the plot or the fans! 

Rian Johnson better avoid going to Comic-Con conventions everywhere cause he's going to get punched by a super hardcore fan of Star Wars one of these days! 

There's so many things to add on why I didn't like it\, and they even added in dialogue from the previous films when Kylo Ren asks Rey to join the dark side which is Darth Vader's line!
